resources.string: 1. If delegation is NOT granted, configure your EMM to delegate \'android.app.admin.DevicePolicyManager.DELEGATION_CERT_INSTALL\' scope to this app.\n2. Once granted, the button will become active.\n3. Requires \'my_keystore.p12\' in res/raw/ and \'YOUR_PASSWORD\' in CertificateInstaller.kt.
